predicate.note: Frames file for 'befuddle' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: Elmer Befudd?
example.text: In 1975, Mr. Pamplin enticed Mr. Hahn into joining the company as executive vice president in charge of chemicals; the move befuddled many in Georgia-Pacific who didn't believe a university administrator could make the transition to the corporate world.
example.arg: many in Georgia-Pacific who didn't believe a university administrator could make the transition to the corporate world
